sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';

      isEditMode: false, // Flag for editing task
    },
    
    // Add more tasks here if needed
  ];

  newComment: string = '';

  constructor() {}

  ngOnInit(): void {}

  // Method to add a comment
  addComment(task: any) {
    if (this.newComment) {
      task.comments.push(this.newComment);
      this.newComment = ''; // Clear the comment input field
    }
  }

  // Method to edit task (toggle edit mode)
  editTask(task: any) {
    task.isEditMode = !task.isEditMode;
    if (!task.isEditMode) {
      alert('Task has been updated!');
    }
  }

  // Method to save changes after editing
  saveTask(task: any) {
    task.isEditMode = false; // Disable edit mode
    alert('Task has been updated!');
  }

  // Method to delete task
  deleteTask(taskId: number): void {
    const confirmDelete = confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this task?');
    if (confirmDelete) {
      this.tasks = this.tasks.filter(task => task.id !== taskId);
    }
  }

  // Method to change task status
  changeStatus(task: any) {
    const newStatus = prompt('Enter new task status:', task.status);
    if (newStatus) {
      task.status = newStatus;
    }
  }
}


<div class="task-list-container">
  <mat-card *ngFor="let task of tasks" class="task-detail-card">
    <mat-card-content>
      <!-- Task Information -->
      <div class="task-info">
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Task </strong>
          <span *ngIf="!task.isEditMode">{{ task.id }}</span>
          <input *ngIf="task.isEditMode" [(ngModel)]="task.id" />
        </div>
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Title:</strong>
          <span *ngIf="!task.isEditMode">{{ task.title }}</span>
          <input *ngIf="task.isEditMode" [(ngModel)]="task.title" />
        </div>
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Description:</strong>
          <span *ngIf="!task.isEditMode">{{ task.description | slice:0:100 }}...</span>
          <textarea *ngIf="task.isEditMode" [(ngModel)]="task.description"></textarea>
          <div *ngIf="task.isShowMore" class="full-description">
            {{ task.description }}
          </div>
        </div>
        <button mat-raised-button color="accent" (click)="toggleShowMore(task)">
          {{ task.isShowMore ? 'Show Less' : 'Show More' }}
        </button>
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Priority:</strong>
          <span *ngIf="!task.isEditMode">{{ task.priority }}</span>
          <input *ngIf="task.isEditMode" [(ngModel)]="task.priority" />
        </div>
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Status:</strong>
          <span *ngIf="!task.isEditMode">{{ task.status }}</span>
          <input *ngIf="task.isEditMode" [(ngModel)]="task.status" />
        </div>
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Assigned Team Member:</strong> {{ task.assignedMember.name }} ({{ task.assignedMember.contact }})
        </div>
        <div class="info-field">
          <strong>Due Date:</strong> {{ task.dueDate | date }}
        </div>
      </div>
    </mat-card-content>

    <!-- Action Buttons -->
    <mat-card-actions>
      <button mat-raised-button color="accent" (click)="editTask(task)">
        {{ task.isEditMode ? 'Save Task' : 'Edit Task' }}
      </button>
      <button mat-raised-button color="warn" (click)="changeStatus(task)">Change Status</button>
      <button mat-raised-button color="warn" (click)="deleteTask(task.id)">Delete Task</button>
    </mat-card-actions>
  </mat-card>
</div>
